name: dinobot
description: Bot for a Discord server I'm in

scripts.init: mv configuration_templates configuration; mv private-template.json private.json; vim private.json
scripts.zip: zip DinoBot.zip -r output configuration_templates private-template.json package.json package-lock.json -x **/.DS_Store
scripts.update: curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/jimpaly/DinoBot/releases/latest | grep "\"browser_download_url\":.*zip" | cut -d '"' -f 4 | wget -qi - -O DinoBot.zip; unzip -o DinoBot; npm update; cp -v -n configuration_templates/* configuration

author: jimpaly
